post.body: Plus with Sci-Fi and NBC all being part of Universal they should work a little "synergy" and make it happen.
You're probably right but I get so frustrated when good shows get the ax and networks like Sci-Fi just produce crap...
I really like that show. sci-fi should pick it up instead of making anymore python flicks.
do or do not. there is no try....
Skidooosh!
mmmmmmm....Bacon.......
I won $749.000 from cokeacola. I just have to send my account info to a yahoo address!
I totally agree. I hope things do change but honestly, tomorrow is just another day.
I feel your pain buddy....
His hair was perfect!
Wayne's World!
